title: How to add background music to a video that you're making - Quora

response.answer_text: How do you add background music to a video that you're making? If you want to add background music to a video file, that’s so easy, you just need to use a video editing software, I suggest Easy Video Maker , it’s a good and easy-to-use video editing software made to be used by anyone, it provides user-friendly features, with it you can easy to add background music to a video file, just three steps. run Easy Video Maker, drag both background music file and video file into the program.drag the background music file down into Audio Line, drag the video file down into Video Line.at last, click lower right “RENDER” button, the program will add the background music into this video and render as a new video.

if you want to add background music to a video that you're making, that’s easy, you could use Easy Video Maker to help you, just three steps. run Easy Video Maker, drag the music file and video file into the program.drag the music file down into Audio Line, drag the video file down into Video Line ( and you can simply right click the blank area of Video Line and select “Audio->Disable Audio” to remove original audio in the video).at last, click lower right RENDER button to output video with new background music.
